Introduction

Steven Kim is a Korean-Australian singer and rapper under F&F Entertainment.

Steven appeared in MNET' survival show Produce X 101 in 2019 as a trainee employed by DS Entertainment. Regretfully, he was eliminated in the fifth episode, finishing 72nd place overall.

On September 9, 2021, he debuted in the group LUMINOUS with the mini album 'YOUTH'. The group unfortunately disbanded on February 9, 2025, after all four members terminated their exclusive contracts with Bareunson WIP.

He was a contestant in SBS' survival show Universe League, where his team, the "Team Rhythm", won the prism cup, securing him a spot as a member of the final group AHOF.
